verbose_text: Bath application of 10 nM TTX severely lowered the spontaneous AP rate of NAm neurons (88.4 +/- 31.6% reduction from baseline, n = 10; XREF_FIG), indicating a strong contribution of TTX sensitive Na + current to basal excitability.
